What is the screen resolution? Other torrents of this are too small. They just get pixelated whenever my gf and I watch them in full-screen on my laptop.

This is the same torrent as the higher-seeded 700MB versions, only encoded at a higher bitrate. From my experience, this version isn't worth the additional 400MB extra space.

The resolution on this is the same as other torrents, 640 x 274, which still looks shitty on anything over 1024x768 resolution in full-screen mode.
